Clickable.Container.name: --clickable-content-z-index
Clickable.Container.description: Controls the z-index of the surfaced interactive content.

Clickable.Container.name: --clickable-item-z-index
Clickable.Container.description: Controls the z-index of the stretched anchor / label.

Clickable.Anchor.name: current
Clickable.Anchor.description: Changes the aria-current attribute, telling screen readers how to handle the link.

Clickable.Anchor.name: disabled
Clickable.Anchor.description: Changes the aria-disabled attribute, telling screen readers how to handle the link and altering it to be greyed-out.

Clickable.Anchor.name: href
Clickable.Anchor.description: Changes the URL that Anchor navigates end-users to when clicked.

Clickable.Anchor.name: download
Clickable.Anchor.description: If linking to a downloadable file, this property will be used as the suggested file name.

Clickable.Anchor.name: rel
Clickable.Anchor.description: Sets how the Anchor relates to the current page, see MDN for more information.

Clickable.Anchor.name: target
Clickable.Anchor.description: Sets the target of the Anchor being navigated, see MDN for more information.

Clickable.Label.name: for
Clickable.Label.description: Sets the for attribute of the element that is targetted.

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {Clickable} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const {Container, Anchor, Label} = Clickable;
</script>

snippets.title: Clickable Anchor

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {
        Clickable,
        Switch,
        Text,
        Tile,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Clickable.Container>
    <Tile.Container width="content-max">
        <Tile.Section>
            <Tile.Header>Remember Login?</Tile.Header>

            <Text>
                <Text is="small">
                    Your session will be saved to your
                    Browser.
                </Text>
            </Text>
        </Tile.Section>

        <Tile.Footer>
            <Clickable.Label for="clickable-label">
                <Switch palette="affirmative" />
            </Clickable.Label>
        </Tile.Footer>
    </Tile.Container>
</Clickable.Container>
snippets.title: Clickable Label

data.render:
Clickable

Clickable stretches a <Clickable.Anchor> / <Clickable.Label> across its parent element, while surfacing other interactive elements above the overlay.

Imports

<script>
    import {Clickable} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const {Container, Anchor, Label} = Clickable;
</script>

Anchor

Use a <Clickable.Anchor> to stretch a clickable <a> across the parent container.

Label

Use a <Clickable.Label> to stretch a clickable <label> across the parent container.
